channel.title: Delta webclient help
channel.description:
Well I'm attempting to make a web client for a friend and I finished all the code related part but when I run the client it downloads then it says "client updated - please reload client" I then looked in my C:/ drive and looked at the cache. For some reason it would save the folder within itself. I know it doesn't make sense but heres a pic: [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/31065410/cache%20error.png[/img]
I used Ric's webclient tutorial by the way. If you need any info please tell me.

item.title: Delta webclient help
